PersonalStatement.text: Matthew Hurst, born on 1972-02-14, is a Female based in Rachelton, Christmas Island. She is Married and holds Czech nationality. Currently working at Garcia-Armstrong.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Vance LLC from 2010 to 2018.
Senior Marketing Specialist at Garcia-Armstrong, 2021 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Taylor's University
Master's in Engineering from Universiti Malaysia Perlis

PersonalSkills.text: Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.
Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys coding personal projects.
